dmca.title: Queens of the Stone Age Album Leak [Blogger]
dmca.body:
May, 5/24/2007 9:53

Notice of Infringement and Declaration 
 
REGARDING:  http://tovornottov.blogspot.com/2007/05/you-bring-light-in.html

The following blog offers links to unauthorized material from the artists Queens of the Stone Age and must be removed immediately:
IMMEDIATELY REMOVE  ALL LINKS, REFERENCES, ARTWORK, DOWNLOADS, VIDEOS AND
MP3 FILES ASSOCIATED WITH Queens of the Stone Age's UNRELEASED ALBUM "Era Vulgaris":

http://tovornottov.blogspot.com/2007/05/you-bring-light-in.html
 

I, the undersigned, do solemnly and sincerely declare and CERTIFY UNDER
PENALTY OF PERJURY that:
 
1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named  ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP ("IP Owner").
 
2. I have a good faith belief that the items or materials identified
in the addendum attached hereto are NOT AUTHORIZED by the above IP Owner,
its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner
